data.title: Hillsong Worship - "What a Beautiful Name" (Story Behind the Song)
data.meta_description: We all love the worship song by Hillsong Worship, titled,
data.text:
We all love the worship song by Hillsong Worship, titled, "What a Beautiful Name". But where did the idea of that song come from? Singer/songwriter/recording artist Brooke Ligertwood (who sings lead on the recording) tells us the story behind the song.

On the blog of their website, Hillsong deconstructs the power behind the name of Jesus, and when that's done, it becomes a pallet of properties to describe how very beautiful the name is.

What hides in the name of Jesus?

The name of Jesus encompasses more than we can hope or imagineâ€”more beauty, more wonder, more power.
